scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && npm run copy:chrome && npm run zip:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && npm run copy:firefox && npm run zip:firefox
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.copy:chrome: mkdir -p build/chrome && cp -r src icons manifest.json build/chrome/
scripts.copy:firefox: mkdir -p build/firefox && cp -r src icons manifest.v2.json build/firefox/ && mv build/firefox/manifest.v2.json build/firefox/manifest.json
